brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts HTTP using the GET command between a client with a browser and an HTTP server.

The client user enters the Universal Resource Locator (URL) http: //www.cisco.com.
Fully qualified domain name: Host: www.cisco.com
File requested: GET /index.HTML HTTP /1.1

Caption text: "Entering http://www.cisco.com in the address bar of a web browser generates the HTTP GET Message."
